mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.create_time as createTime, a.password, a.salt, a.status, a.account, a.email, a.mobilephone, r.id as "role.id", r.name as "role.name", r.description as "role.description" FROM manage_user_account a left join manage_role r on r.id = a.role_id
mapper.insert: insert into manage_user_account( id, create_time, password, salt, status, account, email, mobilephone, role_id ) values( #{id}, #{createTime}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{status}, #{account}, #{email}, #{mobilephone}, #{role.id} )
mapper.select: where account = #{userName} OR email = #{userName} OR mobilephone = #{userName}
